Interface Logger

All Known Implementing Classes:
LoggerImplement
public interface Logger
Logger interface that defines methods for logging various test events. This interface is used to implement custom logging functionality in test automation frameworks. It provides methods to log test results, information, exceptions, and screenshots.
Since:
2025-06-02
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ravi Shankar
